meanings.definition: A board or molding at the base of a wall, often used to protect the wall from damage.
meanings.sent1: The mopboard along the wall keeps the paint safe from scratches.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally kicked the mopboard while moving the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the mopboard was a perfect scratching post.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as straight and neat as a freshly painted mopboard.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast a shadow on the mopboard, highlighting its smooth surface.

meanings.definition: To clean or wipe a mopboard.
meanings.sent1: I need to mopboard the hallway before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: She carefully mopboarded the kitchen floor to make it shine.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could mopboard the entire house in record time.
meanings.sent4: The rain outside seemed to mopboard the windows with its gentle touch.
meanings.sent5: The old mopboarded floor gleamed under the bright lights of the room.
